MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL48 postcode area of Minffordd affecting properties in Cae Eithin Estate and the surrounding area. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 6:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:05PM on 24th February 2021
